name: Bad Day on Majoris VIII
description:
You are a grumpy, grizzled space cowboy, and a ship full of robots crashes into your town. You are now significantly more grumpy, and take out your anger on the nearby robots and sacred temple.

Enemies drop power ups. You pick them up. They go away after 10 seconds. Picking up the next one resets the timer.

This game is a balancing act of speed, collection, and accuracy, if you lose your powerups, life becomes significantly more difficult. If impressions are positive, then more can be added, this project was a blast to work on, and we would both love to continue to add features! 

Pre-jam Assets:

  • Footstep sounds.
  • Shooting sounds.
  • Bullet impact sounds.
  • Pickup sounds.
  • Checkpoint sounds.
  • UI sounds.
  • Global wind sound.
  • 1 Music track for second boss.
  • Blunderbuss Model.
  • Skeleton Model.
  • 3 House Models
  • 4 Animations for CRU5H-3R
  • 3 Animations for Cyborgs
  • Player Walk Left/Right/Back/Forward (Blended with custom upper-body animation)
  • Mesa Rocks (Heavily modified during jam) from Quixel.
  • Fonts: Vanilla Whale and Share Tech Mono
